channel.title: How do i get my npc's too have hp!?
channel.description: i have moparscape 3.1,i dont have anyother private server thing.i've tryed everything i can think of.it's really confusing !i spent 3 hours trying too figure it out.but i still cant. :confused: :confused:

item.title: How do i get my npc's too have hp!?
item.dc:creator: @mr_candy mr candy
item.description:
@mr_candy wrote:

open up your npc.java file or cfg i can not remember but anyway open it up should have a list of // NpcID NpcName combat health npc = 0 Hans 0 0and a list underneath it once you have found that hit ctrl + f type in the box the npc you want to add hp to you should see the npc like thisnpc = 3 Man 2 7edit the number to the far right like this one is >>7<< hope this helped

Read full topic

item.title: How do i get my npc's too have hp!?
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

What are you doing , typeing ::npc ####?
Or are you spawning them through your source file in autospawn.cfg.
and if your useing the moparscape 127.0.0.1 ip then you cant have hp on npc’s , get one from the downloads section.

~bryanc~
